title: Clock Face Eight-Thirty

nouns: A clock is an instrument to indicate, keep, and co-ordinate time.
A timepiece that shows the time of day
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time.
Instrument to measure or keep track of time.
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.

description: The face of an analog clock displaying the time as eight-thirty.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'eight thirty' emoji is a precisely rendered analog clock face, displaying the time as 8:30. The hands are sharp and clearly defined, set against a clean white dial with subtle 3D shading that gives it a tangible feel. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients ensure the numbers and markers are easily legible, conveying a sense of punctuality and specific timing. This emoji is perfect for indicating a particular appointment or a precise moment in a conversation, bringing a touch of classic elegance to your digital schedule on Apple devices.
